channel.title: Job posting: aid data lab manager in Nairobi
channel.description:
Hi, everyone. At UNOCHA, we're looking to hire a new manager for our East Africa humanitarian data lab in Nairobi. Familiarity with aid data standards like HXL and IATI isn't a requirement, but it would be a big plus:
http://docs.humdata.org/hiring-a-new-lab-manager-in-nairobi-join-us/
This job is open to both local and international applications, and we'd be grateful if you could share it with anyone you think might be interested.
Thanks, David
